Municipal Library
=================

La Joya Municipal Library educates people of all ages through literature.

Susana Villegas
---------------

Director

Susana Villegas is a career librarian having worked for the La Joya Municipal Library in a variety of positions for nearly 25 years.

![Susana Villegas](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/2f2ad4_97f74ec999424d90a6d1903c02cdf0b5~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_374,h_489,al_t,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/2f2ad4_97f74ec999424d90a6d1903c02cdf0b5~mv2.jpg)

Department Description
----------------------

Quick Facts

La Joya Municipal Library is dedicated to the education of people of all ages through literature.

​

Our library enables the La Joya community access to a variety of books, articles and a computer lab.  With a new website and online catalog, the Municipal Library is able to provide much-needed resources to everyone.

The La Joya Municipal Library was established on December 8, 1993 and joined the [Hidalgo County Library System (HCLS)](https://hclstx.org/) on April 26, 1994.

[News](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/news)

* [![Facebook](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0fdef751204647a3bbd7eaa2827ed4f9.png/v1/fill/w_30,h_30,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/0fdef751204647a3bbd7eaa2827ed4f9.png)](https://www.facebook.com/lajoyamunicipallibrary/)

Library Services
----------------

### Hours

![Astronomical clock](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/11062b_9cbbca61e3fa435ba9bf0dbfb370653b~mv2_d_6016_4000_s_4_2.jpg/v1/crop/x_818,y_0,w_4380,h_4000/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Astronomical%20Clock.jpg)

Library hours are:

​

Monday-Thursday:  9:00 am – 7:00 pm

Friday:  9:00 am – 5:00 pm

Saturday-Sunday:  Closed

​

La Joya Municipal Library

201 Palm Shores Drive  
La Joya TX 78560-9008

[956.581.4533](tel:956.581.4533)

### Catalogs

![Library card catalog](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/11062b_098acff3ae2a4e388f2e635ac64b8c53~mv2.jpg/v1/crop/x_602,y_0,w_3259,h_2976/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Library%20Cards.jpg)

Check-out our Inter-Library Loan (ILL) programs and online catalogs:

​

* [Hidalgo County Library System Catalog](https://hidalgo.insigniails.com/Library/Home?libraryid=4533)
* [Kids Catalog](https://hcls.tlcdelivers.com/kids?config=lajoya#/categories)
* [Library of Congress](https://www.loc.gov/)
* [TexasShare](https://www.texshare.net/)

### Programs

![Calendar pages](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/11062b_880c7b78f2784cb48e182e145a301663~mv2.jpeg/v1/crop/x_622,y_0,w_3364,h_3072/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Calendar%20Pages.jpeg)

Books are just part of our offerings.  The La Joya Municipal Library offers programs throughout the year.

​

* English as Second Language (ESL) Classes
* Holiday Events
* Summer Reading Program
* Talking Book Program

​

Detailed information on our events is on the City's [Events Calendar](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/calendar).

### Services

![Children using computers at La Joya Municipal Library](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/2f2ad4_872d926a079d426996d01fe5116722bf~mv2.jpg/v1/crop/x_277,y_0,w_1495,h_1365/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Children%20Using%20Computers%202.jpg)

The Library offers its patrons a variety of services, some at no cost and others for a small fee.

​

* Computer Lab
* Faxing, Printing & Scanning
* [Voter Registration](https://www.hidalgocounty.us/522/Voter-Information)
